action.des: Pitching Change: Gio Gonzalez replaces Max Scherzer, batting 5th, replacing left fielder Jayson Werth.
action.des_es: Cambio de Lanzador: Gio Gonzalez reemplaza a Max Scherzer, como quinto bate, en lugar de jardinero izquierdo Jayson Werth.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: Rafael Bautista replaces first baseman Ryan Zimmerman, batting 4th, playing right field.
action.des_es: Sustitución a la Defensiva: Rafael Bautista reemplaza a primera base Ryan Zimmerman, como cuarto bate y jugando en el jardinero derecho.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: Adam Lind replaces right fielder Bryce Harper, batting 3rd, playing first base.
action.des_es: Sustitución a la Defensiva: Adam Lind reemplaza a jardinero derecho Bryce Harper, como tercer bate y jugando en el primera base.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: Chris Heisey replaces shortstop Trea Turner, batting 1st, playing left field.

action.des: Michael Taylor remains in the game as the center fielder.

action.des: Wilmer Difo remains in the game as the shortstop.
